name: circuits
description: This describes the circuit used in pallet.

scripts.setup:transfer: snarkjs groth16 setup transfer.r1cs pot12_final.ptau transfer_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute transfer_0000.zkey transfer_0001.zkey --name='1st Contributor Name' -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey transfer_0001.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.prove:transfer: snarkjs groth16 prove transfer_0001.zkey witness.wtns proof.json public.json
scripts.setup:confidential_transfer: snarkjs groth16 setup confidential_transfer.r1cs pot12_final.ptau confidential_transfer_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute confidential_transfer_0000.zkey confidential_transfer_0001.zkey --name='1st Contributor Name' -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey confidential_transfer_0001.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.prove:confidential_transfer: snarkjs groth16 prove confidential_transfer_0001.zkey witness.wtns proof.json public.json
scripts.pot: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 pot12_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --name='First contribution' -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot12_0001.ptau pot12_final.ptau -v
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify verification_key.json public.json proof.json
scripts.transfer: yarn compile:transfer && yarn witness:transfer && yarn pot && yarn setup:transfer && yarn prove:transfer && yarn verify
scripts.confidential_transfer: yarn compile:confidential_transfer && yarn witness:confidential_transfer && yarn pot && yarn setup:confidential_transfer && yarn prove:confidential_transfer && yarn verify
